review.title: “Unless you plan on being here a while don't invest your time”
review.pros: Pros – Easy JobGood People to work withGood work experienceWorking here I felt like I was part of a family, and my boss and everyone I worked with was friendly and the culture of the business is very focused on being genuine and hard working
review.cons: Cons – The Pay SucksGenerally boringCustomers are sometimes rudeThere are a lot of people looking over your shoulderI always felt like no matter how good a job you were doing, there was always something the managers wanted you to do regardless if there was work left to do or not.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Let employees have a little wiggle room and don't spend most of you watching to see if we are making mistakes, it just makes employees nervous.
